word: How stands your life record?  Is Jesus pleading in your behalf in vain?  Shall He be disappointed in you? Some of your companions, who stood side by side with you, have already been summoned away.  Eternity will reveal whether they were bankrupt in faith and failed to secure eternal life, or whether they were rich toward God and heirs of the "far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory."  Will you not consider that the long forbearance of God toward you calls for repentance and humiliation of soul before Him?  -- 5T 350, 351.
